1370: Gheldekin moved to Nieu straet.B.4 after marriage.
Got married to Ermegardis at age 29 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Ermegardis, Rycaldis, at age 29.
1373: Had a son with Ermegardis, Remdo, at age 32.
1374: Had a daughter with Ermegardis, Heilsota, at age 33.
1375: Had a daughter with Ermegardis, Euffemia, at age 34.
1378: Had a daughter with Ermegardis, Remsindis, at age 37.
1380: Had a daughter with Ermegardis, Itsburgis, at age 39.
Became caretaker of Rycaldis, Remdo, Heilsota, Euffemia, Remsindis, Itsburgis at age 40.
